meanings.sent1: After a long nap, the cat slowly began reawakening.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the sun plays a role in rewakening the world.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock seemed to be in a competition with the cat's rewakening routine.
meanings.sent4: As the flowers bloomed in spring, they brought a sense of rewakening to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sound of birds chirping outside signaled the rewakening of nature.

meanings.definition: The act of waking up again.
meanings.sent1: The rewakening of the city was evident as people started their day.
meanings.sent2: His sudden rewakening in the middle of the night startled his roommate.
meanings.sent3: The rewakening of the computer after a power outage was a relief to the student.
meanings.sent4: The rewakening of interest in the old book led to a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The rewakening of memories from childhood brought a smile to her face.
